title: Digital Glow Watch Face
summary: Digital watch face with a beautiful illumination.
description: Digital watch face with a beautiful illumination and 9 unique color skins:- emerald - the original,- amber,- amethyst,- jadeite,- ruby,- sapphire,- quartz,- citrine,- morganite.Designed for round and square devices.Additional features:Additional features:- custom signature - type whatever you like,- watch and phone battery indicators,- date indicator,- 12/24h digital time.Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
descriptionHTML:
Digital watch face with a beautiful illumination and 9 unique color skins:
- emerald - the original,
- amber,
- amethyst,
- jadeite,
- ruby,
- sapphire,
- quartz,
- citrine,
- morganite.

Designed for round and square devices.

Additional features:
Additional features:
- custom signature - type whatever you like,
- watch and phone battery indicators,
- date indicator,
- 12/24h digital time.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.

ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+
https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
comments: I love how I can customize the signature. It feels,more personal. Great job dude
recentChanges: - NEW watch signature - type in whatever you like,
